heroContent: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a knack for crafting robust and scalable web applications. I have honed my skills in front-end technologies like React and Angular and back-end technologies like ASP.NET Core, Node.js, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. I aim to leverage my expertise to create innovative solutions that drive business growth and deliver exceptional user experiences.
aboutMeContent: I am a dedicated and versatile full-stack developer based in Lahti, Finland, with a passion for creating efficient, user-friendly web applications. My journey in programming began in 2016 with a simple curiosity: how to print 'Hello, World!' using Java. Since then, that curiosity has blossomed into a rewarding career, driven by my commitment to continuous learning and embracing new challenges. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I thrive in collaborative environments where solving complex problems and delivering high-quality solutions is key. My experience spans developing scalable web applications, and Iâ€™m always eager to expand my knowledge and adapt to the evolving tech landscape. Outside of coding, I enjoy staying active and exploring the latest innovations in technology, which fuels my passion for continuous growth as a developer.

experiences.description: Led a team in developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js. Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated with MongoDB databases. Collaborated with stakeholders to define project requirements and timelines.

Led a team in developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js. Implemented RESTful APIs and integrated with MongoDB databases. Collaborated with stakeholders to define project requirements and timelines.

projects.title: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A fully functional e-commerce website with features like product listing, shopping cart, and user authentication.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: An application for managing tasks and projects, with features such as task creation, assignment, and progress tracking.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and contact information.

projects.title: Blogging Platform
projects.description: A platform for creating and publishing blog posts, with features like rich text editing, commenting, and user profiles.
